title: Frank Ocean
summary: Frank Ocean (born October 28, 1987)[3][4] is an American singer, songwriter, and rapper. He is recognized for his idiosyncratic musical style, introspective and elliptical songwriting, and wide vocal range. Music critics have credited him with revitalizing jazz and funk influenced R&B, as well as advancing the genre through his experimental approach.[5] He is considered a representative artist of alternative R&B.[6]
